about_the_game:
THE OFFICIAL SOUNDTRACK OF THE GAME BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 3 I OPENED A PORTAL TO HELL IN THE FAVELA TRYING TO REVIVE MIT AIA I NEED TO CLOSE IT! Comprised of SONG'S CREATED BY DJALMA JOE (Joeveno's musical alter ego) for the game, these songs are experimental rough breakcore songs with a brazilian flavor. This selection of songs for this separate album focus on songs made exclusively for the game

THE TRACK'S LOCAL FILES HAVE WALLPAPERS, PROFILE PHOTOS, EXPLANATION OF THE STORY IN WIKI, AS WELL AS LINKS TO DOWNLOAD THE GAMES CONCEPT BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 1 (2018) AND BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 2 (2019) (YES, THEY EXIST!)

(WARNING: some tracks are not included, cuz some tracks in the game are royalty free songs, etc, don't think it makes sense for me to put it in this album, sorry for that, please be aware of that before you buy. You can download these tracks for free in the game's local file folder called "download the other songs here", there will be links to FLAC and MP3 on to download Non included tracks: SALGA, 9CRISTOPAODEACUCAR, METRORIO, AMANHA, FINAL E EPILOGUE.) 

New songs will be added in the future alongside the next levels for free! So buy it and you'll always have something new composition to hear once a new level drop.
detailed_description:
THE OFFICIAL SOUNDTRACK OF THE GAME BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 3 I OPENED A PORTAL TO HELL IN THE FAVELA TRYING TO REVIVE MIT AIA I NEED TO CLOSE IT! Comprised of SONG'S CREATED BY DJALMA JOE (Joeveno's musical alter ego) for the game, these songs are experimental rough breakcore songs with a brazilian flavor. This selection of songs for this separate album focus on songs made exclusively for the game

THE TRACK'S LOCAL FILES HAVE WALLPAPERS, PROFILE PHOTOS, EXPLANATION OF THE STORY IN WIKI, AS WELL AS LINKS TO DOWNLOAD THE GAMES CONCEPT BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 1 (2018) AND BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 2 (2019) (YES, THEY EXIST!)

(WARNING: some tracks are not included, cuz some tracks in the game are royalty free songs, etc, don't think it makes sense for me to put it in this album, sorry for that, please be aware of that before you buy. You can download these tracks for free in the game's local file folder called "download the other songs here", there will be links to FLAC and MP3 on to download Non included tracks: SALGA, 9CRISTOPAODEACUCAR, METRORIO, AMANHA, FINAL E EPILOGUE.) 

New songs will be added in the future alongside the next levels for free! So buy it and you'll always have something new composition to hear once a new level drop.
